Recipe.Name: Small Business
Recipe.Description: Basic Recipe for a Small Business
Recipe.Author: Jesse and Amanda Harlin

Feature.enable: Orchard.jQuery, Orchard.Tags, Orchard.Lists, TinyMce, Orchard.Media, Orchard.MediaPicker, Orchard.ContentPicker, Orchard.PublishLater, Orchard.Widgets, Orchard.Widgets.PageLayerHinting, Orchard.ContentTypes, Orchard.Scripting, Orchard.Projections, Orchard.Forms, Orchard.Scripting.Lightweight, Simian.Libraries, Simian.Framework, PackagingServices, Orchard.Packaging, Gallery,Gallery.Updates, Bootstrap, TheThemeMachine

Orchard.Command:
layer create Default /LayerRule:"true" /Description:"The widgets in this layer are displayed on all pages" layer create Authenticated /LayerRule:"authenticated" /Description:"The widgets in this layer are displayed when the user is authenticated" layer create Anonymous /LayerRule:"not authenticated" /Description:"The widgets in this layer are displayed when the user is anonymous" layer create Disabled /LayerRule:"false" /Description:"The widgets in this layer are never displayed" layer create TheHomepage /LayerRule:"url '~/'" /Description:"The widgets in this layer are displayed on the home page" layer create Products /LayerRule:"url '~/products'" /Description:"The widgets in this layer are displayed on the products page" layer create Fibgerglass /LayerRule:"url '~/fiberglass'" /Description:"The widgets in this layer are displayed on the fibgerglass page" layer create About /LayerRule:"url '~/about'" /Description:"The widgets in this layer are displayed on the about page" layer create Contact /LayerRule:"url '~/contact'" /Description:"The widgets in this layer are displayed on the contact page"
site setting set baseurl
theme activate "SmallBusiness"
widget create GalleriaImageGalleryWidget /Title:"Main Page Gallery" /Zone:"Billboard" /Position:"1" /Layer:"TheHomepage" /RenderTitle:false /Identity:"HomePageGallery"
menu create /MenuName:"Main Menu"
page create /Slug:"home" /Title:"Brand New Small Business Site" /Path:"~/" /Homepage:true /Publish:true /UseWelcomeText:true page create /Slug:"products" /Title:"Products" /Path:"~/products" /Homepage:false /Publish:true /UseWelcomeText:true /MenuText:"Products" /MenuName:"Main Menu" page create /Slug:"fiberglass" /Title:"Fiberglass" /Path:"~/fiberglass" /Homepage:false /Publish:true /UseWelcomeText:true /MenuText:"Fiberglass" /MenuName:"Main Menu"
page create /Slug:"about" /Title:"About" /Path:"~/about" /Homepage:false /Publish:true /UseWelcomeText:true /MenuText:"About" /MenuName:"Main Menu" page create /Slug:"contact" /Title:"Contact" /Path:"~/contact" /Homepage:false /Publish:true /UseWelcomeText:true /MenuText:"Contact" /MenuName:"Main Menu"
widget create MenuWidget /Title:"Main Menu" /RenderTitle:false /Zone:"Navigation" /Position:"1" /Layer:"Default" /Identity:"MenuWidget1" /MenuName:"Main Menu"
